title: lolclient.exe has stopped working
body: Starting today (September 2nd, 2016) in patch 6.17, whenever I launch League of Legends client, the popup "lolclient.exe has stopped working" comes up before I have a chance to click anything.  I've tried restarting my computer, repairing the client, and opening it as administrator, and none have worked. Looking for somebody who knows what to do or how to fix it/bypass it. Thanks

replies.body: Are you using any third party programs?  Apps like play.tv, overwolf, etc have been known to cause some issues with the client.  If so, disabling it could fix this.  Let me know!

I have been using plays.tv but recently it stopped working, so should I uninstall it maybe?
After around 2 hours of not opening the client, it seems the issue has resolved itself, will update again if the problem starts up again. Thanks
